abstract: Evercore Partners, the boutique investment bank, said on Thursday that it has hired George R. Ackert, a senior banker from Bank of America Merrill Lynch, to establish its transportation and infrastructure team.
snippet: Evercore Partners, the boutique investment bank, said on Thursday that it has hired George R. Ackert, a senior banker from Bank of America Merrill Lynch, to establish its transportation and infrastructure team.
lead_paragraph: Evercore Partners, the boutique investment bank, said on Thursday that it had hired a senior banker from Bank of America Merrill Lynch to establish its transportation and infrastructure team.

headline.main: Evercore Hires Top Merrill Transportation Banker
